item.title: Report X-2025020619
item.description:
Report X-2025020619

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-15T03:17:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-27
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WENT TO A CALL IN NORTH OUTSIDE INDUCT IN SMALLS. THEY CONTAINERIZED THE LEAKER AND BROUGHT BACK TO PSC FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. UPON INSPECTION, IT WAS DISCOVERED THAT THE PRODUCT WAS NAIL POLISH. NO EXTERNAL MARKING ON PACKAGE OR SHIPPING LABEL WERE FOUND TO INDICATE PACKAGE CONTAINED HAZARDOUS PRODUCTS.

item.title: Report X-2025020497
item.description:
Report X-2025020497

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-13T06:18:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-08
  • City: SPRINGFIELD
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A ONE GALLON COLEMAN BEVERAGE COOLER DUE TO BEING VERY COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY 0.5 POUNDS OF DRY ICE COOLING A PLASTIC VACUUMED SEALED BAG OF AN UNKNOWN MATERIAL. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER PACKAGING. THE SHIPPER INFORMATION ON THE THERMAL TRACKING LABEL DOES NOT HAVE A FULL SHIPPER ADDRESS VISIBLE. THE PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER X837V1, OMH, 1035 CONGER ST, EUGENE OR 97402-6938. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.title: Report X-2025020498
item.description:
Report X-2025020498

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-13T06:18:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-27
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: HAZMAT AUDITOR NOTIFIED RMP OF SUSPECTED REPEAT SHIPPER SENDING UNDECLARED BATTERY PACKAGES THROUGH UPS SYSTEM. RMP CALLED HMSC AND CONFIRMED CONTENTS WERE IN FACT THE SAME BATTERY AS PREVIOUSLY REPORTED CONFIRMED BY ADG COMPLIANCE TO BE UNDECLARED. ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBERS: 1ZA4A5560394704954, 1ZA4A5560395943828, 1ZA4A5560397843914, 1ZA4A5560398263861, 1ZA4A5564298883814, 1ZA4A5560398311906, 1ZA4A5560399363877, 1ZA4A5560396011832, 1ZA4A5560392431172, 1ZA4A5560397983924, 1ZA4A5560394138567, 1ZA4A5560395487849, 1ZA4A5560395771853, 1ZA4A5560397987895, 1ZA4A5560391682788 AND 1ZA4A5560395471883

item.title: Report E-2025020126
item.description:
Report E-2025020126

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-13T06:18:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-10
  • City: CLACKAMAS
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 17:32 EST, ERTS XPO Logistics (UPO) about a cargo release. It was reported that due to improper loading, approximately 2 ounces of Foam Solvent Base Adhesive (hazardous - UN1133) was released. The caller stated that the released product was contained to the container and did not impact the trailer floor. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and they felt comfortable cleaning the release donning the proper PPE per SDS. The released product and damaged container will be placed into a 50-gallon poly drum and staged in OS&D. There were no drains, soils or waterways reported to have been impacted by the release. There is no regulatory reporting required for this release. ERTS will upload the BOL, SDS and create a waste container entry. ERTS contacted Charlie (Chemtrec) who provided report #2024011000151.
